Summary: ufo was high then it came down very rapidlycame to a slow crawl then dissappeared behind tree line
trends: There have been no other sightings in crandall
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsa friend and i pulled into dewberry church parking lot we had just came from the package store and stopped to have a beer.we saw the lights in the sky and isaid to my friend look there is bud flying over his house he had just began taking flying lessons. my friend said that's not an aeroplane.i could tell the fear in his voice ilookedup again and the object was much closer the object was close enough to se a row of windows all down the side it was making no noise and had slowed to a speed hardly faster than a man could run. the object appeared to be about three feet long from my perspective i was curious but not curious enough to get out of the car.the object continued moving across the field then disappeared behind the tree line about five hundred feet away after the object disappeared we sat very still and quiet for a couple of minutes then left the area very quickly.
